response.original_title: The Smile – Live at Montreux Jazz Festival
response.overview: The first live album by the English rock band the Smile, released on 14 December 2022 by XL Recordings. Comprising of performances of songs from their first album, A Light for Attracting Attention (2022), recorded at Montreux Jazz Festival on 12 July 2022.
response.title: The Smile – Live at Montreux Jazz Festival
